title: Woman's awayo (mantle)
description: two pieces sewn together; predominantly brown and red with stripes in red, pink, yellow, white, blue and purple with white patterning on some stripes; trimmed with diamond patterned edging; warp faced plain weave with complimentary warp woven pattern bands and tubular woven edge finish
creditline: Gift of Juliann McGuire and Michael McGuire
